original_text: Your children will hurry back to you, to build you again. The enemies who destroyed you will go away. Your children will hurry back to you,
korean_text: 네 자녀들은 빨리 걸으며 너를 헐며 너를 황폐하게 하던 자들은 너를 떠나가리라

sentences.original_text: Your children will hurry back to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자녀들이 서둘러 당신에게 돌아올 것이며,

sentences.original_text: Your children will hurry back to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 자녀들이 서둘러 당신에게 돌아올 것입니다.
